dcterms:description: A dataset containing 77,887 chest X-ray images from 27,796 patients, collected for COVID-19 diagnosis, focusing on minimizing bias in AI models for chest X-ray diagnosis.
dcterms:title: Medical Imaging and Data Resource Center (MIDRC) dataset

dcterms:creator: Yiwen Liu
Wenyu Xing
Mingbo Zhao
Mingquan Lin
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 112,120 frontal chest X-ray images from 30,805 patients, used for diagnosing thoracic abnormalities including pneumonia and other conditions.
dcterms:title: NIH Chest X-ray (NIH-CXR) dataset
